name: ban
description: Ban a user from the server.

name: kick
description: Kick a user from the server.

options.name: song
options.description: The name of the song to play.

name: shuffle
description: Shuffle the songs in the queue.

name: nowplaying
description: Display information about the currently playing song.

name: queue
description: Display the list of songs in the queue.

name: equalizer
description: Adjust the equalizer settings of the bot.

name: meme
description: Fetch a random meme from the internet.

name: rps
description: Play Rock, Paper, Scissors with the bot.

name: td
description: Play a fun game of Truth or Dare.

name: welcomemsg
description: Set up a customized welcome message for new members.

name: randomd
description: Roll a random size of dice.

name: counting
description: Set up a counting game in a channel.

name: owner
description: Get information about the creator of the Discord bot.

name: help
description: Display a list of available commands.
